info.author: Philippe Lagadec
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
ExeFilter is an open-source tool and python framework to filter file formats in e-mails, web pages or files.
It detects many common file formats and can remove active content (javascript, macros, etc) according to a configurable policy.
See http://www.decalage.info/exefilter for more information.
info.name: exefilter
info.summary: A tool and python framework to analyze files and sanitize active content such as javascript and macros
info.html_description: ExeFilter is an open-source tool and python framework to filter file formats in e-mails, web pages or files. It detects many common file formats and can remove active content (javascript, macros, etc) according to a configurable policy. See http://www.decalage.info/exefilter for more information.
